hero.title: Earn money for a good cause—just by surfing the web.
hero.text: We’ll donate to a cause you choose whenever you click on a browser ad.

facets.title: Support your cause
facets.text: Find an organization you want to support, then choose one of its current fundraising goals.

facets.title: Do it anytime, anywhere
facets.text: Earn money across all your devices. One extension does it all, securely. Just download once, and you’re set!

facets.title: Care better together
facets.text: Connect with local or global teams around your cause and organization. Track your team’s progress.

facets.title: Share the good
facets.text: Share your cause with friends. And invite them to join!
